entry.title: Over $750 Million Stolen in Crypto Last Quarter Despite Drop in Hacks: CertiK
entry.summary: Phishing and private key compromises dominated Q3, with Ethereum as the top target, according to cyber security firm CertiK.

entry.title: Trump Vows Once Again to 'Save' Silk Road Founder Ross Ulbricht
entry.summary: Trump vowed to come to the aid of Ulbricht on Wednesday, reviving his story and the Silk Road platform that defined Bitcoin’s early use.

entry.title: Ethereum Options Volatility Outstrips Bitcoin’s as US Election Looms. Why it Matters
entry.summary: Traders are positioning for volatility tied to a cloud hanging over the future of decentralized finance regulations in the US.

entry.title: Kalshi Revives US Election-Based Betting for Americans Following Court Freeze
entry.summary: Kalshi previously launched U.S. election prediction markets on September 12 but quickly closed them following an appeals court order.

entry.title: Edward Snowden Slams Solana Over ‘Centralization’—And SOL Devs Are Pushing Back
entry.summary: Whistleblower Edward Snowden took aim at Solana, renewing an old debate—and prompting SOL believers to defend the network.

entry.title: Republican Senate Candidate Blasts Crypto PAC Fairshake Over Snub: ‘They Needed a Democrat’
entry.summary: Longtime crypto supporter Mike Rogers shares why he thinks industry super PAC Fairshake funneled millions towards his Democratic Senate opponent.

entry.title: SEC Moves to Appeal Ripple Ruling as XRP Tumbles
entry.summary: The SEC's lawsuit against the crypto payments company has been ongoing since late 2020.

entry.title: Ethereum Strategy Game 'Shardbound' Open Beta Hitting Steam, Epic Store
entry.summary: Ethereum strategy card game Shardbound on Immutable zkEVM is launching into open beta next week. Here's what to expect.

entry.title: Chatbot Based on Teenage Murder Victim Creates More Trouble for Character AI
entry.summary: The platform removed the chatbot after the dead girl’s uncle, the founder of Kotaku, complained.

entry.title: SEC Director Who Helped Lead Crypto Crackdown Is Departing
entry.summary: Gurbir S. Grewal will soon depart the SEC's enforcement unit after the agency authorized over 100 enforcement actions against crypto firms.

entry.title: TikTok Maker ByteDance Reveals Powerful New AI Video Generators
entry.summary: While the world waits for OpenAI to release Sora, Chinese companies are gaining a lead with models that produce amazing results.

entry.title: Hacker Admits to Swiping $38 Million in Crypto From Investment Firm
entry.summary: A man from Indiana admitted to hacking an investment company to steal almost $38 million in crypto from nearly 600 people.

entry.summary: Looking for the X Empire daily combo and rebus solution for Wednesday, October 2? Here are the latest boosts for the Telegram game.

entry.summary: Crypto drops as Middle East tensions flare. $500m liquidations in drop. BTC ETFs see largest outflows in a month. Fidelity ETH ETF sees 2nd highest outflow ever. SUI hits 6-month highs, bridge goes live on mainnet. Hashdex set to launch XRP ETF. Wormhole leads altcoin gains after Upbit lists. BTC miners hit record low profits in September Crypto hackers stole $750m in Q3. Telegram has been disclosing IPs since 2018.

entry.title: Franklin Templeton Expands Blockchain Fund to Aptos
entry.summary: Franklin Templeton has put its blockchain U.S. treasury fund on yet another network, adding Aptos just weeks after expanding to Avalanche.

entry.title: Telegram Founder Says App Was Built to Protect People From ‘Corrupt Governments’
entry.summary: But that has limits. "We do not allow criminals to abuse our platform or evade justice," the Telegram founder said.

entry.title: How Arbitrum is Simplifying Web3 for Web2 Adopters
entry.summary: Arbitrum's Head of Korea, John Park, joined Rug Radio creator Pukerainbow at ArbiVerse to talk about the Ethereum layer-2's strategy in Asia, hackathons, and bringing enterprise clients to its ecosystem.

entry.title: Here Is Today’s 'Captain Tsubasa: Rivals' Telegram Game Daily Combo
entry.summary: Anime soccer game Captain Tsubasa: Rivals gives out 5 million free daily balls ahead of the TON token airdrop. Here’s the combo for Wednesday, October 2.

entry.title: Monero Dips 7% as Kraken Says It's Delisting XMR for European Customers
entry.summary: “We did not take this decision lightly," Kraken wrote in a blog post about delisting XMR.

entry.title: Nibiru Foundation Launches Strategic Venture Arm To ‘Support Web3 Innovation’
entry.summary: Nibiru Ventures will support emerging blockchain projects building within the Web3 ecosystem, with a focus on DeFi.

entry.title: Bitcoin Liquidations Top $500 Million After Sharp Market Correction
entry.summary: "Minor corrections are in the offing in the market. Altcoins, particularly ETH will show growth," one analyst said in a note.

entry.title: Half of US Voters Consider Crypto 'Important' Ahead of Election: Poll
entry.summary: The survey comes on the heels of Vice President Kamala Harris publicly courting the crypto industry for the first time during her campaign trail.

entry.title: Bitcoin Stares Down Several Tailwinds as Global Stimulus, US Election, and FTX Payouts Loom
entry.summary: Even as investors attempt to discern the economic impact of flaring tensions in the Middle East, four major tailwinds for Bitcoin stand out.

entry.title: Australia’s ‘Operation Kraken’ Seizes $6.4 Million in Crypto Linked to Global Crime
entry.summary: The seizure was made possible after Australian Federal Police analysts cracked the seed phrase from wallets retrieved from several devices.

entry.title: Crypto Laws Are Coming No Matter Who Wins Election: Rep. Tom Emmer
entry.summary: Republican Majority Whip Tom Emmer laid out his top crypto legislative priorities for Decrypt, and explained why he thinks they’re likely coming sooner than many expect.

entry.title: Prediction Markets Favor Walz over Vance in VP Debate
entry.summary: Gamblers favor the Minnesota Governor in the debate, betting on topics like immigration and abortion with high odds.

entry.summary: After being released from prison, the world’s largest crypto billionaire says he wants to chill out and invest in AI. But will he?

entry.title: Bitwise Files for XRP ETF Following Bitcoin, Ethereum Approvals
entry.summary: Bitwise aims to launch an XRP ETF, confirming to Decrypt that the filing with the state of Delaware is legitimate.

entry.title: Diddy Hires Lawyer of Prison Bunkmate Sam Bankman-Fried
entry.summary: Disgraced hip-hop superstar Diddy is using crypto crook Sam Bankman-Fried's lawyer to appeal his jail time, court documents show.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 209 - LET UPTOBER BEGIN!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs see inflows for 8 straight days. SUI enters top 20, $110m of unlocks today. SOL weekly DEX volume flips ETH. Firedancer sees very fast TPS on Testnet. ETH gas up 500% in 2 weeks. EIGEN opens at $7bn FDV. FTX creditors vote in favour of restructuring plan. Dell to sell another $1.2bn Dell stock. Metaplanet buys another 107 BTC.Grayscale opens decentralised AI fund to investors. Robinhood allows crypto transfer in EU. Pollak to head Coinbase Wallet & join exec team. Gemini to close in Canada. Japan considers lower cap gains tax on crypto. Ohio bill would make it legal to pay taxes in crypto. Trump project opens whitelist to non-US users. CZ pledges to invest in blockchain companies.

entry.summary: Two of Telegram’s biggest crypto games just dropped their tokens, but Hamster Kombat's HMSTR and Catizen's CATI are both falling fast.

entry.title: As Israel, Iran Tensions Rattle Markets, Will Bitcoin Act as a Safe Haven?
entry.summary: The price of Bitcoin was dented Tuesday as Iran rained missiles on Israel. Will it hold up amid fears of all-out war?

entry.title: Chainalysis: Russia Is Loudest and 'Most Pervasive' Country Using Crypto to Skirt Sanctions
entry.summary: “Russia has become an international force using cryptocurrency for everything from sanctions evasion to ransomware attacks," one exec said.

entry.title: Binance CEO Richard Teng Talks Progress on Exchange's Global Regulatory Goals
entry.summary: Decrypt Reporters Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano spoke with Binance CEO Richard Teng about the crypto exchange's progress on establishing a global headquarters, improving its relationships with regulators, and expanding its global presence in the wake of founder Changpeng "CZ" Zhao's jailing in the U.S.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 207 - WELCOME BACK TO THE BULL!
entry.summary: Kamala signals support for crypto. Top memecoins all soar, add $10bn in value in a week. MOODENG hits $180m, does 11x in a week. SUI & SEI continue to lead L1s for price & TVL growth. Revolut & Robinhood are considering stablecoin. Visa launches new tokenisation platform for banks. PayPal to allow business accounts to hold crypto Hamster kombat's HMSTER disappoints on launch. Biden admin may have forced Silvergate’s closure. Court rules crypto mining boxes ‘are securities’.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 206 - MEMES ARE PUMPING!
entry.summary: BTC nears $65k key resistance level. Kamala makes positive comments about crypto. PayPal allows businesses to hold crypto. Visa allows banks to test RWAs & smart contracts. Cuban wants to be head of SEC. Silvergate claims about ‘Chokepoint 2.0’ grow. Truflation hacked for $5m. Telegram Wallet blocked in UK & US. Court rules crypto mining boxes are securities. Infinex DeFi platform raises $65m. Ethena announces new stablecoin linked to BUIDL.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 205 - ALTCOINS CONTINUE TO RALLY!
entry.summary: SUI leads L1 gains as TVL crosses $1bn. Altcoin market cap close to breaking downtrend. SEI becomes top chain for 1 month TVL growth. ETH ETFs sees 3rd largest inflow ever. SEC delays ETH ETF options decision. SOL took most of ETH outflows over last 3 months. SOLETH continues to be trading at resistance. $8.1bn BTC options to expire this week. BTC heading to $500k-$1m in a year: PlanB. Stablecoin supply hits new ATH. Caroline Ellison sentenced to 2 years in jail. SBF & Diddy in the same jail. SEC settles against TUSD for not being collateralised. Gensler gets derided for crypto approach. Hester Pierce admits flaws in SEC crypto policy. Harris against regulation by litigation: Cuban. Golem claims ETH move to CEXs due to staking. Binance refutes data leak claims. Next Y combinator batch has ‘no crypto companies’. Celo overtakes Tron for stablecoin addresses.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 204 - MOODENG MOO-NING!
entry.summary: BTC needs to top $65.2k to put in a higher high. ETH ETFs see biggest outflow since July. ETH outperformance could be start of ‘alt season’. BlackRock gets 12hr BTC withdrawal from Coinbase. cbBTC only wrapped BTC to not show reserves. Telegram to share user data upon legal requests. EIGEN non-transferability to be removed Sep 30th. TIA announces $100m funding round. TIA deal was OTC token sale ‘done months ago’. Polymarket considers token, trying $50m raise. Maybe we will pay off debt with crypto: Trump. Harris unlikely to give full crypto policy pre-election. 13m Binance users’ data may have been leaked. Caroline Ellison likely won’t serve time in jail.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 203 - KAMALA GOES PRO-CRYPTO
entry.summary: Crypto funds saw $321m inflows last week. Kamala commits to crypto & AI expansion. TAO leads gains in AI hype, does 2x in 2 weeks. SUI TVL breaks $900m. Average Q4 returns for BTC is 88%. BTC Google searches down 75% since 2021. BTC 161 days from halving, when it rallied in 2020. Crypto VCs raised $2.2bn this year, well below 2021.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 202 - SOL STARTS TO SEND IT
entry.summary: SOL leads majors as Breakpoint begins. SOL launches Frankendancer on mainnet. Helio Pay allows Shopify items to sell on X. Franklin Templeton to launch fund on SOL. BTC short term holders fall at fastest rate in 12 years. MicroStrategy upsizes convertible note raise to $1bn. BingX loses $52m in hack. $243m crypto heist exposed by ZachXBT. Supreme Court of India hacked on X, shills scam. SocGen launches Euro stablecoin on SOL. Sky agrees to stop using WBTC. Germany shuts down 47 crypto exchanges. Stablecoin’s now 18th biggest holder of treasuries. Consensys lawsuit against SEC dismissed. Partisanship will stop Trump crypto plans: Hoskinson. Scaramucci working with Kamala on crypto.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 201 - CRYPTO FLYS AFTER FED
entry.summary: Crypto rips higher after Fed cuts 50bps. $22bn shorts would be liquidated by $70.5k. SUI continues to lead L1s, does 2.5x in a month. Trump buys burgers with Bitcoin. Bitcoin is hedge against US debt: BlackRock. Commerzbank to offer BTC & ETH trading. Solana unveils Seeker phone, $70m pre-orders Helius Labs raise $21.75m. WazirX hacker moves $32m ETH to Tornado cash. SEC made up crypto regulation ‘out of thin air’. BitGo to launch stablecoin. Revolut considers creating stablecoin. Ethena front-end gets hacked, funds safe.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 200 - DONALD TRUMP RECAP
entry.summary: Bitcoin dominance rises ahead of Fed. May see short-term crash after Fed: Hayes. ETH underperformance may reverse soon: BitWise. Vitalik sings during Token 2049 appearance. SUI & FTM continue to outperform in L1s. BNB to introduce gasless stablecoin transfers. Tether market share hits 75%. Australia launches 3-year CBDC program. Russia to pay China in crypto for war supplies. USDC available for Brazil & Mexico bank transfers. We are one of the biggest users of blockchain: Dimon. Kamala may push crypto firms abroad: Nansen CEO. Dragonfly looking to raise $500m fund. Bitget users hit 45m, most growth from TON. Gensler pushed to clarify his stance on airdrops. Binance denies involvement in WazirX hack. Janus Henderson to tokenise fund. TON partners with Curve for stablecoin swaps. LINK & Fireblocks partner for stablecoin issuance. WalletConnect seat to airdrop 185m WCT tokens.

entry.title: How Jan 6. Organizer Became Meme Coin Kingpin
entry.summary: Dustin Stockton is known as the “Godfather of Political Finance” but he wasn’t always known this way. He was originally heavily involved in campaigning for Donald Trump and was the lead organizer of January 6. As the protest came closer, he realized things would go south and backed out. From home, he watched Trump supporters raid the capitol building. He knew his life was never going to be the same.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 199 - SO ABOUT YESTERDAY
entry.summary: Crypto majors bounce with stocks & gold after CPI. Kamala odds flip Trump after Presidential debate. SUI, FTM, ICP, TON lead gains in Alt L1s. Grayscale launches XRP trust, SUI to follow. FTX unstakes part of SOL position, large unlocks in Q1. 5 major announcements coming for SOL this month. SOL active addresses hits ATH for any blockchain. ETH dominance falls to 14%, lowest level in 3 years. AI coins strong as Nvidia & chip optimism returns. SWIFT set to build infrastructure for RWA trading. Coinbase launches wrapped Bitcoin product. ENS integrated with Venmo & PayPal. Pendle introduces Bitcoin yield pools at 45%. POPCAT gets Kraken listing, leads top SOL memes. SUNDOG breaks $300m after ByBit spot listing. Casino tokens rise, RLB up 100% in 2 weeks. Ape Punk sells in ‘heist’ for 10ETH. XCOPY editions & 1/1s see high sales. Fantasy Top trading volume continues to grow. Trump family set to launch crypto project Monday.

entry.title: Why CEO Jack Lu Is Pushing Magic Eden Beyond NFTs
entry.summary: Magic Eden's grip on the NFT market has been cemented by a multi-chain approach under co-founder and CEO Jack Lu. Now the marketplace is pushing forward with a digital wallet that bridges Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana as it eyes other future expansions. Lu discusses Magic Eden's evolution since its early days, along with valuable lessons learned in the turbulent crypto industry.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 198 - THE GREAT APE HEIST!
entry.summary: Crypto rises with stocks after CPI falls again. Bitfinex BTC longs continue to grow. SUI again leads L1s, up 18%. FTX estate unstakes $24m SOL, still has $943m. Binance introduces SOL liquid staking. SWIFT introduces infrastructure for RWA transfers. Pendle launches Bitcoin yield pools. UK makes crypto legal property. India leads crypto adoption for second year. Vitalik won’t advertise L2s with multi-sig security. Based rollups seen as alternative future for ETH. Blockchain music start up raises $50m. Ford & Toyota file blockchain patents.

entry.title: Fomo Hour 197 - Debate Disaster
entry.summary: Crypto falls slightly after Presidential debate. Exchanges see highest BTC outflow since May. Be wary of Yen move for BTC: Hayes. SOL active addresses hit ATH. At least 5 massive SOL announcements coming: Mert. Binomial to introduce restaking on BNB. Indonesian exchange hacked for $22m. Atomic Wallet wins lawsuit over $100m hack. Lawyers argue Ellison shouldn’t go to jail. ENS integrated with Venmo & PayPal. Galaxy & State Street launch 3 crypto ETFs. Standard Chartered begins UAE crypto custody. AAVE leads resurgence in DeFi coins.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 196 - THE INFLOWS RETURN!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$29m, ETH ETFs: -$5m. BTC rallies, ETF has first inflow in 9 trading days. BTC may have put in first higher low in 6 months. Saylor predicts $13m price for BTC. Wealth advisors quickly adopting BTC: BitWise CEO. Binance among few firms to get Indonesia license. Spot trading on CEXs up 30% in August. SEC made $4.68bn from crypto firms in 2023. $5.6bn lost to scams in 2023. XRP security status may be unchallenged in appeal. EtherFi announces credit card on Scroll. Base has more DEX users than other L2s combined. Tether & Tron create taskforce against crime. TIA still only making $585 in daily fees. WLD investigated by Singapore police.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 195 - CAN WE GET A BOUNCE?
entry.summary: BTC: 55.3k (+2%), ETH: 2320 (+1%), SOL: 130 (0%). Top Gainers: FTM, TAO, BTT, AAVE, TON, ATOM. Crypto mini-bounce continues, BTC reclaims $55k. BTC RSI hits lowest level since July 2021. Bitfinex longs continue to grow aggressively. BTC hashrate hits another ATH. BTC could hit $90k on Trump election: Bernstein. BlackRock settles intraday BTC trades off-chain. Spot BTC ETFs have been a failure: Bianco. Power giant Tepco explores Bitcoin mining. ETH Foundation & Vitalik continue to sell ETH. Farcaster DAU’s down 95%.
